name: Moon Star Assault Runner
description:
In the distant future, Allied Space Bases are under constant attack by alien threats. It's up to the player to blast as many enemy bombers out of the sky while avoiding rugged moonscapes.

Moon Star Assault Runner has a diverse and engaging system allowing players to explore and battle through over 10 unique battle environments. Additionally, players can purchase upgrades by collecting cash and rewards during play.

Another great game by KnightStar Games!
